get:
(:action get_gems
    :parameters (?g - gems ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (at ?g unacquired) (at ?p ?l))
    :effect (and (at ?g acquired) (not (at ?g unacquired)))
)

(:action buy_stuff
    :parameters (?s - stuff ?p - player ?store - location ?home - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?s in_store) (at ?p ?store))
    :effect (and (at ?s in_home) (not (at ?s in_store)))
)
build:
(:action build_rooms
    :parameters (?r - room ?p - player ?b - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?r unmade) (at ?p ?b))
    :effect (and (at ?r created) (not (at ?r unmade)))
)

(:action create_rooms
    :parameters (?r - room ?p - player ?k - kids-room)
    :precondition (and (at ?r unmade) (at ?p ?k))
    :effect (and (at ?r created) (not (at ?r unmade)))
)

(:action make_area
    :parameters (?a - area ?p - player)
    :precondition (and (at ?a unselected) (at ?p ?l))
    :effect (and (at ?a selected) (not (at ?a unselected)))
)
keep:
(:action keep_family_safe
    :parameters (?k - kids ?p - player ?r - room)
    :precondition (and (at ?k ?r) (at ?p ?r))
    :effect (and (safe ?k) (not (unsafe ?k)))
)
```

These actions represent the steps to complete the task "Make Your Den Look Like a Home on Animal Jam (Non Members)" based on the descriptions and entity states provided. Each action follows the format of specifying parameters, preconditions, and effects, ensuring the logic aligns with the task's requirements.
